        character(5) :: time1, time2

        read(time1(1:2), *) h1
        read(time1(4:5), *) m1
        read(time2(1:2), *) h2
        read(time2(4:5), *) m2

        totalMinutes1 = h1 * 60 + m1
        totalMinutes2 = h2 * 60 + m2

        diff = totalMinutes1 - totalMinutes2
        totalMinutes = modulo(diff, 1440)   ! This gives non-negative modulo 1440

        hour = totalMinutes / 60
        minute = mod(totalMinutes, 60)

        ! Format timeString as "HH:MM"
        write(timeString(1:2), '(I2.2)') hour
        timeString(3:3) = ':'
        write(timeString(4:5), '(I2.2)') minute

        ! Now, decode timeString with the second program's logic
        s = .false.
        outLen = 0
        outputStr = ''   ! initialize to blanks

        do i=1,5
            c = timeString(i:i)
            if (c == '.') then
                if (s) then
                    outLen = outLen + 1
                    outputStr(outLen:outLen) = '1'
                    s = .false.
                else
                    outLen = outLen + 1
                    outputStr(outLen:outLen) = '0'
                end if
            else
                if (s) then
                    outLen = outLen + 1
                    outputStr(outLen:outLen) = '2'
                    s = .false.
                else
                    s = .true.
                end if
            end if

        if (outLen == 0) then
            x = 0   ! if no digit was produced, we set to 0? but the original would output nothing? then the third program would read nothing? -> error? 
        else
            read(outputStr(1:outLen), *) x

        if (x == 2) then
            ! do nothing
        else if (mod(x,2) == 0) then
            x = x+1
        end if

        do while (.true.)
            isPrime = .true.

            if (x < 2) then
                isPrime = .false.
            else if (x == 2) then

            else
                ! Check divisibility by 2? but we made x odd? so skip even divisors?

                do j=3, sqrtX, 2
                    if (mod(x,j) == 0) then
                        isPrime = .false.
                        exit
                    end if
                end do
            end if

            if (isPrime) exit
            x = x + 2
        end do

        print *, x

        end program
